attributes.action: Bring back the death penalty for    child paedophile's and child rapists
attributes.additional_details: Everyday these paedophiles are in the news and in the papers and on social media,enough is enough !! Bring back the death penalty as it's needed for these animals,this would be a firm deterrent in stopping these sub human animals from hurting another child and hurting their families,Only deterrent is the death penalty and keeping them alive is a waste of tax payers money, keeping them alive is wrong !! Only punishment for them is to die as painfully as possible !
attributes.background: Paedophile's,child grooming and child sex trafficking are a sickness in today's society and most will re-offend,they should be given the death penalty and not kept alive in their comfy jails by the tax payers expense . A dog bites a child it is put down,the same should apply to these people aswel !
